title: Shattered Wills: A Short Story of Self-Discovery of Pet Parents by Chance
description: A journey of two strangers from dissimilar life experiences to encountering and becoming pet parents and much more is where Tetsuo and Yana come alive. Both of these characters are nuanced, layered, solemn, and relatable to lonely souls in the world trying to find an anchor in the midst of an unnamed city's hustle and bustle.Come and explore the mundanities of living the lives of Tetsuo and Yana, pet parents to a male kitten they have a meet-cute with out of unexpected circumstances.But can their life have more meaning than being pet parents?Were they even equipped enough to nurture and groom it with love?What happens when the kitten goes missing, and they are forced to make a decision?Will they be more than just their labels of strangers, neighbours, or pet parents?Will they heal their own shattered wills and recover from a wounded past to form a more stable, sustainable, and successful bond free from trauma or unhinged pain?Devour this story and find yourself imagining the extra in your ordinary lives because moments like these teach you to survive and thrive.
author: Nishant Garg
